name: Zgadula
overview: Zgadula is a Polish language game loosely based on the popular American TV game show, Wheel of Fortune for the Commodore Amiga. The players take turns guessing the consonants or buying the vowels to form a word or a saying. The game allows up to three human or computer players for on up to nine rounds. Each turn begins with the wheel spin, determining a win prize for the consonant or ending up with bankruptcy or loss of the turn. After the last round, a winner is the player with the largest amount of money.
